title: Session Management
subtitle: Browse and manage Claude Code session history

emptyState.title: Please select a monitored directory
emptyState.description: Select a directory from the left list to view its session files

sidebar.title: Projects
sidebar.noDirectoriesHint: Click "Add Directory" to select a project directory to monitor

addDialog.title: Add Monitored Directory
addDialog.description: Confirm to add this directory to the monitoring list? The application will scan all session files in this directory.

renameDialog.title: Rename Monitored Directory
renameDialog.description: Set a new display name for this monitored directory.

sidebar.selectDirectory: Select Claude session directory to monitor

fileList.title: Session Files
fileList.emptyState: No session files in this directory
fileList.emptyStateHint: No Claude Code session records in this directory yet

detailView.title: Session Details
detailView.noContentHint: The session file is empty or has incorrect format

forceReParse.confirmMessage: This will clear the cache and re-parse the entire JSONL file. Continue?

viewLevel.title: View Level
viewLevel.description: Select the display level for session messages

full.label: Full Mode
full.description: Show all message types, including tool calls and errors

conversation.label: Conversation
conversation.description: Show only user, assistant, and thinking messages

qa_pairs.label: Q&A Mode
qa_pairs.description: Extract user questions and final answers, skip intermediate steps
